sentence.text: Pure hair and natural killer cell activation involved in immune response ectodermal dysplasia 9 (ECTD-9) is an autosomal recessive genetic disease caused by mutation of anatomical structure morphogenesis and is characterized by hypotrichosis and nail dystrophy in humans.

entity.text: natural killer cell activation involved in immune response

sentence.text: Unlike patients with ECTD-9, anatomical structure morphogenesis-mutated mice and attachment of GPI anchor to protein do not faithfully recapitulate the phenotype of hypotrichosis, so there is a limited understanding of the molecular mechanism of Hoxc13-mediated hypotrichosis in animal models and clinically.

entity.text: attachment of GPI anchor to protein

sentence.text: Therefore, our findings demonstrate that anatomical structure morphogenesis<sup>-/-</sup> rabbits can be used as a model for human ECTD-9, especially to understand the pathologic mechanism of hypotrichosis.

Moreover, the disrupted balance between HFs and cell adhesion mediated by integrin, especially in the anatomical structure morphogenesis<sup>-/-</sup> rabbits, can be used as an ideal animal model for dermatology ailments, such as acne and hypotrichosis, in preclinical studies.-Deng, J., Chen, M., Liu, Z., Song, Y., Sui, T., Lai, L., Li, Z.
